## templit list

list templates

### Synopsis

outputs a table of all available templatedin config directory

```
templit list [flags]
```

### Examples

```
templit list
```

### Options

```
  -h, --help   help for list
```

      --config string   config file (default is $HOME/.config/templit/templit.yaml)
